item.title: Hip Fractures
item.description: Fracture of the femur distal to the femoral head and proximal to a level 5 cm below the trochanter Intracapsular (within the capsule) - possible vascular compromise Extracapsular (outside the capsule) - 5 cm distal to lesser trochanter Inter-trochanteric Sub-trochanteric In elderly - occurrence of falls often signs underlying ill health
